snippet: Philip Seymour Hoffman, perhaps the best actor of his time, specialized in flawed, even detestable characters, and in making audiences care about them.
abstract: A O Scott looks back on life of actor Philip Seymour Hoffman, who died at age 46; reflects Hoffman, who was perhaps the best actor of his time, specialized in flawed, even detestable characters, and in making audiences care about them.
lead_paragraph: Philip Seymour Hoffman, perhaps the best actor of his time, specialized in flawed, even detestable characters, and in making audiences care about them.
